      • getConstraints

        public java.util.List<TimeFrameConstraint> getConstraints()
        Description copied from interface: Schedulable
        This returns the constraints this schedulable has for new appointments. These include BackToBackConstraints and PreferenceConstraint. Warning: Always create new list, otherwise not thread safe.
